short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Browser Extension To Manage Cookies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookie Cook is a cookie manager. 

It supports：
★ Delete any cookie
★ Search a cookie
★ Export cookies in JSON, Python dict，Http header  value(perfect for wget and curl)
